LanguageData.SingleHalfMagAssault.letterText: A mass produced super soldier known as the Half-Mag has been sent by {FACTION_name} to assault your colony. Keep your distance and keep moving as it can quickly close the distance with a deadly dash ability.\n\nTry hiding behind walls as it readies its ability!
LanguageData.SingleHalfMagAssault.label: Half-Mag Rampage
